Package net.sf.jailer.subsetting

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TransformerFactory
    Creates transformer (as Session.ResultSetReader which transforms rows into an external representation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectedRowsCounter
    Count the number of collected (and deleted) rows.
    ExplainTool
    Creates a listing of all association-paths of exported entities back to a subject in an entity-graph (the 'explain.log' file)
    ExportStatistic
    Provides statistical information about the export process.
    SubsettingEngine
    The Subsetting Engine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScriptFormat
    Enumeration of output formats.
    ScriptType
    Enumeration of SQL-script types.
